USERNAME.BLANK: Email Id cannot be blank. Please enter valid Email Id.
USERNAME.MIN_LENGTH: Email id should be minimum 6 characters.
USERNAME.MAX_LENGTH: Email id should be maximum 50 characters.
USERNAME.INVALID: Email id is invalid. Please enter valid Email Id.

PASSWORD.BLANK: Password cannot be blank. Please enter valid Password.

DIALOG_INPUT.ERRORS.INPUT.BLANK: Cannot be blank. Please enter valid detail.

PLANNED.LABEL: System is under Maintenance. Please try after sometime. Sorry for inconvenience.
PLANNED.DESCRIPTION: We are enhancing our system now.System will not be available for a while. Please try after sometime. Sorry for the inconvenience.

UNPLANNED.LABEL: We are enhancing our system now. System will not be available for a while. Please try after sometime. Sorry for the inconvenience.
UNPLANNED.DESCRIPTION: System is not available at this moment. Please try again later. Sorry for the inconvenience.

CONFIRMATION.MESSAGE_LABEL: Are you sure you want to Logout?

FIRSTNAME.REQUIRED: FIRST NAME cannot be blank. Please enter valid FIRST NAME.
FIRSTNAME.MAX_LENGTH: FIRST NAME should be maximum 50 characters.

EMAIL.REQUIRED: EMAIL cannot be blank. Please enter valid FIRST NAME.

This shows all the users in the application.
These users can be deleted by clicking delete icon displayed at the end of each row in table.
